experience.description:
• Developed the firmware for electronic price tags. 
• Developed the firmware for automotive and stationary electronics as part of the Russian national project V2X.

• Developed the firmware for automated control systems of the Armed Forces and Strategic 
Missile Forces of Russia (Defence Procurement).
• Developed the web project Hive of Love, the blogosphere for the churched.
• Developed the firmware for the new cash register Dreamkas-F. Was the lead developer and ideologist of the device, planned architecture, created the codebase.

• Developed the firmware for automated control systems of the Armed Forces and Strategic 
Missile Forces of Russia (Defence Procurement). 
• Created enterprise coding standards in C, C++ languages in order to unify the developers' code.

• Developed the firmware for the new PLC modem Spread Spectrum signal modulation. 
• Participated in development of device electronic circuit. 
• Finalized and accompanied old lines of PLC devices.

• Developed the firmware for the new (fifth) generation of StarLine car alarms. Was the lead developer and ideologist of the device, planned architecture, created the codebase. 
• Created the coding standard in the C language in order to unify all developers' code.

• Developed the firmware for the new PLC modem of G3-PLC standard. That also was the practical part of my master's thesis. That thesis was awarded the prize of the Government of St. Petersburg for research and solution of problems of introducing the world's first modem of G3-PLC industry standard into Russian energy enterprises: in September 2012, it won a grant competition in the field of scientific and technical activities, organized by the Committee for Science and Higher Education. 
• Participated in development of device electronic circuit.

• Developed application software for internal proprietary protocol testing; for remote update of the manufactured products. 
• Developed the firmware for GPS/GLONASS navigators to be installed in public transport of St. Petersburg. 
• Developed the firmware for the pilotless aircraft. 
• Did soldering, device assembly, repairs, worked as courier (delivered electronics and contracts), visited bus and trolleybus depots to test the produced equipment.

• Developed application software for modem firmware updates. 
• Researched the problem of increasing data transmission speed over electrical network of PLC modems of G3-PLC standard. 
• Did reverse development of the firmware for broadband PLC modem in order to build the 
"multiple point-to-multipoint" network architecture. Topic of the bachelor thesis.

• Developed application software for Call Center department to work with customers. 
• Developed application software for system support department, in particular, collected database switches of buildings connected to the Internet service provider (given by the employer), and implemented a web interface to work with it through SNMP.

higher.name: Saint Petersburg State Polytechnical University
higher.faculty: Faculty of Technical Cybernetics, Master with the major in "Computer Science and Engineering". Specialization: "Technology of software systems development".

higher.name: Saint Petersburg State Polytechnical University
higher.faculty: Faculty of Technical Cybernetics, Bachelor with the major in "Computer Science and Engineering"

additional.name: Modern technologies of programming and production of packaged software products
